customc.landing-page-widget { font-family: 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Arial, sans-serif; color: #2c3e50; } /* Hero */ .hero-section { position: relative; height: 400px; background-size: cover; background-position: center; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; text-align: center; } .hero-overlay { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0,0,0,0.4); backdrop-filter: blur(2px); } .hero-content { position: relative; z-index: 1; color: white; } .hero-content h1 { font-size: 42px; font-weight: 700; margin-bottom: 15px; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 1px; } .hero-content p { font-size: 20px; margin-bottom: 25px; } .hero-buttons .btn { background: #3498db; color: #fff; padding: 12px 24px; margin: 0 10px; border-radius: 24px; font-size: 16px; text-decoration: none; transition: background 0.3s ease; } .hero-buttons .btn:hover { background: #2980b9; } /* Features */ .features-section { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(280px, 1fr)); gap: 30px; padding: 50px 20px; max-width: 1000px; margin: 0 auto; } .feature-card { background: white; border-radius: 15px; padding: 25px; text-align: center; box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.08); transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease; } .feature-card:hover { transform: translateY(-5px); box-shadow: 0 12px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); } .feature-icon { font-size: 36px; color: #3498db; margin-bottom: 15px; } .feature-card h3 { font-size: 20px; font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 10px; } .feature-card p { font-size: 14px; color: #7f8c8d; margin-bottom: 15px; } .feature-link { color: #3498db; font-weight: 600; text-decoration: none; } .feature-link:hover { text-decoration: underline; } /* Footer */ .landing-footer { text-align: center; padding: 25px; background: #2c3e50; color: white; margin-top: 40px; } sp_instancefalsenaresh4falsenaresh4falsefalsesp_widgetDEPAVATH.NARESH2025-09-09 03:56:07f54fe93ed07322107f443dc785febba31naresh4e8373316286322107f449b0adbfc117ce8373316286322107f449b0adbfc117csp_widget_f54fe93ed07322107f443dc785febba3DEPAVATH.NARESH2025-09-09 04:07:17f54fe93ed07322107f443dc785febba3DEPAVATH.NARESH2025-09-09 03:56:05878f2d3ed07322107f443dc785febb480DEPAVATH.NARESH2025-09-09 03:56:05sp_widget
